name: author
description: Author name.

name: author_date
description: Author date (when the original author made the commit).

name: blanks
description: Number of blank lines in a file.

name: blanks_per_loc
description: Number of blank lines per line of code.

name: ccn
description: Code Complexity of a file.

name: comments
description: Number of comments in a file.

name: comments_per_loc
description: Number of comment lines per line of code.

name: commit_date
description: Date when committer made this commit.

name: commit_sha
description: Commit hash.

name: committer
description: Author name.

name: ext
description: File extension

name: file_path
description: File Path

name: grimoire_creation_date
description: Commit date (when the original author made the commit).

name: id
description: Graal Item Id.

name: loc
description: Lines of code in a file.

name: loc_per_function
description: Number of lines of code per function definition.

name: message
description: Commit message as a single String.

name: metadata__enriched_on
description: Date when the item was enriched.

name: metadata__gelk_backend_name
description: Name of the backend used to enrich information.

name: metadata__gelk_version
description: Version of the backend used to enrich information.

name: metadata__timestamp
description: Date when the item was stored in RAW index.

name: metadata__updated_on
description: Date when the item was updated in its original data source.

name: modules
description: Modules which the file is part of

name: num_funs
description: Number of function definition in the file

name: origin
description: Original URL where the repository was retrieved from.

name: project_1
description: Project (if more than one level is allowed in project hierarchy)

name: project
description: Project.

name: repo_url
description: Anonymized URL where the repository was retrieved from.

name: tag
description: Graal tag.

name: tokens
description: Number of tokens in a file

name: uuid
description: Graal UUID.
